page.title: 06The Castle Eden Walkway
page.content: The Castle Eden Walkway follows the path of what was originally the Castle Eden Railway line. It has been developed as a public footpath and cycleway. The walkway provides the people of Stockton with a pleasant "country" walk through a fairly densely populated part of the town. The hedges at either side of the walkway hide the houses from the view of the stroller, or cyclist, and thus give the illusion of being in the countryside. The Castle Eden Walkway also provides a habitat for a large variety of plants and animals which would not otherwise be found in this urban environment.
